comment._content: More about Dr. Foss: www.rmslusitania.info/people/second-cabin/carl-foss/ He died in 1824, age 37, from complications following surgery: www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=84458548

comment.author: 76016463@N00
comment._content: According to the New  York Times, he arrived in New York aboard the American Lines'  SS New York on 5/24/15, the date on the negative.
